meanings.definition: A person or company that has exclusive control over a commodity or service.
meanings.sent1: The monopolists in the town were the only ones selling water.
meanings.sent2: The monopolists set high prices for their products.
meanings.sent3: The monopolists decided to charge a fortune for their lemonade stand.
meanings.sent4: The monopolists ruled the market with an iron fist.
meanings.sent5: The monopolists held the key to the entire industry.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in monopolistic practices.
meanings.sent1: The group of monopolists colluded to fix prices.
meanings.sent2: The monopolists were investigated for unfair business tactics.
meanings.sent3: The monopolists played a game of monopoly in their free time.
meanings.sent4: The monopolists cornered the market with their schemes.
meanings.sent5: The monopolists plotted to dominate the market completely.
